mulan.regressor.clus

Class ClusRandomForest

  • java.lang.Object
    • mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase
      • mulan.classifier.clus.ClusWrapperClassification
        • mulan.regressor.clus.ClusWrapperRegression
          • mulan.regressor.clus.ClusRandomForest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MultiLabelLearner, TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class ClusRandomForest
extends ClusWrapperRegression
    This class is a wrapper for the Multi-Target Random Forest (MORF) algorithm implemented in CLUS library.
    Version:
    2013.04.01
    Author:
    Eleftherios Spyromitros-Xioufis
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • buildInternal

        protected void buildInternal(MultiLabelInstances trainingSet)
                      throws Exception
        Description copied from class: ClusWrapperClassification
        This method does the following:
        1. Creates a working directory for the CLUS library
        2. Makes the supplied training set CLUS compliant and copies it to the working directory
        3. Modifies the File, TestSet and Target lines of the settings file to the appropriate values
        Overrides:
        buildInternal in class ClusWrapperClassification
        Parameters:
        trainingSet - the training data set
        Throws:
        Exception - if learner model was not created successfully
